resources.string: Before we begin with the \"War\" cards game, let\'s understand the game:

string-array.name: label_game_rules
string-array.item: • This game can be played between 2–4 players.
• A deck of cards is dealt equally among all the players.
• A card is drawn randomly from each player\'s pile.
• The player with the highest card wins 1 battle.
• The battle winner gets the cards of other players in his/her pile of cards.
• If there is a tie between players with the same card, the player with the higher number of cards in the pile wins.
• If there is still a tie then a random player wins the battle.
• The game continues until a single player has won 10 such battles or a player runs out of the cards in his/her pile.
